page.title: 05SPORTS CENTRE , WITHAM.
page.content: Witham is a small town with a population of 25,000 people,therefore we would not need a lot of places for sport. There is only one main{sports centre} in Witham. It is called The Bramston Sports Centre and is part of the Bramston Comprehensive School,one of the two secondary schools in Witham.It has three pools, a large sports hall and several specialised rooms .There are outside sports pitches, and a canteen .It was opened in 1973 by Henry Cooper.One of the newest sports is American football. There are two{bowling greens}in the town.The{Football}and{Rugby}Clubs are off Spa Road.The{Cricket}and the {Hockey}Clubs play in the Park on Maldon Rd.The Park was originally part of the garden of a house in Newland Street.
